rules_text:
Flying, haste, prowess
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost 5 or more life this turn, you may exile Jean Grey from the battlefield or from your graveyard. If you do, return her to the battlefield transformed at the beginning of your next upkeep.
special_text2:
If Phoenix would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile her instead.
[+1]: Phoenix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card, then discard a card.
[-3]: Exile target noncreature, nonland card from a graveyard. You may cast it this turn, and you may spent mana as though it were mana of any color to do so.
